com.astamuse.asta4d.web.servlet

Class Asta4dServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.astamuse.asta4d.web.servlet.Asta4dServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringInitializableServlet

    public class Asta4dServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Here we are going to implement a view first mechanism of view resolving. We need a url mapping algorithm too.

        protected void service()
                throws Exception
        Subclass can override this method to do something before or after real service process. eg. WebApplicationContext.setAccessURI(String) can be called before this method to rewrite access uri.
